title: Why is my league not "connecting" me

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Not sure why its happening but i cant connect to league my internet is fine, and i have tried everything i could think of. https://gyazo.com/394c8ea36339283a7a54b4fc0c906584

replies.body: Even though your net is fine, it looks like something is blocking you from reaching the pvp.net or chat service.  Try a port forward in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot, then give your client a restart to boot.  Let me know if it helps!
